remarks: Axiom of Archimedes : a characterization of the Archimedean property for ordered fields.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Apr-2018.)
statement:
isarchiofld.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
isarchiofld.h $e |- H = ( ZRHom ` W ) $.
isarchiofld.l $e |- .< = ( lt ` W ) $.
isarchiofld $p |- ( W e. oField -> ( W e. Archi <-> A. x e. B E. n e. NN x .< ( H ` n ) ) ) $.
$d .< n x $.
$d B n x $.
$d H x $.
$d W n x $.
